channel.title: Advancedscape [317] Great Economy & PK!
channel.description:
[img]http://advanced-scape.com/images/logo4.png[/img] 24/7 || Minigames || Hiscores || Webclient || PK || Great Community || Plenty to do! [URL=http://"http://www.advanced-scape.com"]http://www.advanced-scape.com[/URL]
Several minigames including:
- 63 wave fight cave - fight pits - Pest Control - Duel arena - warriors Guild - Ranging Guild - Fishing trawler
Tons of bosses, some include:
- Kalphite queen (Drops TORVA) - Tormanted Demons - KBD - Corp Beast - Chaos Elemental - Dag kings - Godwars (All bosses) - Barrelschest (with anchor)
We also have Hiscores and a webclient as well as a downloadable Client: Full HD, FULLSCREEN CLIENT!
SKILLS: - 100% SUMMONING SKILL - Hunter! - Dungeoneering 50% made (Still in progress) - All other skills work Perfectly!
[size=12pt][b]Why Advancedscape?[/b][/size] Advancedscape is NOT FOR PROFIT, meaning we won't be trying to milk money out of anyone or offer OMG EPIC PHATS, ALL 99S AND 5 BIL for money.. We definitely listen to all players and constantly try and add in suggestions or fix any problems. Advancedscape was originally made in 2008 and ended in 2009, We are now bringing it back new and improved to bring back the memories and a great community, That's all we want at Advancedscape, A great community! You just have fun and enjoy the server and let us worry about everything else! :)
So join us now: Home:[url=http://www.advanced-scape.com]http://www.advanced-scape.com[/url] Forum:[url=http://www.advanced-scape.com/forum]http://www.advanced-scape.com/forum[/url] Webclient:[url=http://www.advanced-scape.com/webclient.html]http://www.advanced-scape.com/webclient.html[/url]
[size=14pt]Media:[/size]
Widescreen home: [img]http://advanced-scape.com/images/widescreen.png[/img]
Voting rewards: [img]http://advanced-scape.com/images/vote.png[/img]
Summoning: [img]http://advanced-scape.com/images/summoning.png[/img]

24/7 || Minigames || Hiscores || Webclient || PK || Great Community || Plenty to do!

We definitely listen to all players and constantly try and add in suggestions or fix any problems.
